title: (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 6 of 2003)) and 2A (inserted by section 4 of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Data Protection Act 1988 (Section
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Data Protection Act 1988 (Section 

2B) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited data protection act 1988 (section 2b) regulation 2023

title: (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 6 of 2003)) and 2A (inserted by section 4 of the
heading: 2. The processing is authorised of sensitive personal data by the
text_raw:
2. The processing is authorised of sensitive personal data by the 
Commissioner of the Garda Síochána, or a member of the Garda Síochána of 
any rank below Commissioner acting on behalf of the Commissioner, for the 
purpose of enabling the Commissioner to comply with the Directive issued by 
the Minister for Justice on 28 July 2023 to the Commissioner under section 25(1) 
of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) relating to the Victims’ 
Payments Board of Northern Ireland. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 September, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [443] 3
